title: Shesus
description: TheRose , 15 lives in isolation in the last protected forest of The Americas with her mother Mooma, and 9 year old sister Bugbee. When their mom vanishes, the girls are forced to venture into a works poisoned by The Big Sick. following the secret map encoded in Moomas beaded necklace the girls must navigate the strange mall dwellings that the last vestiges of mankind are forced to live in in order to survive- intent on solving the mystery of their moms disappearance. In the process they discover the real story behind their dads death, who the legendary enigmatic character really is and why they are all being relentlessly pursued by the sinister and all- powerful Govercorp as the fate if mankind hangs in the balance
author: Hilary Shepard
